name: Focus
description: Adds the Marksman ability to all weapons so that pressing Shift slows down time.
author: Atampy26

name: Realistic AI
description: Increases AI attentiveness and time spent searching. Three levels of difficulty.
author: Atampy26

name: The New Army
description: Episode 1 of Mushroom's Special Assignment Pack. Replaces Arrival.
author: musicalmushr00m

name: A Case Most Peculiar
description: Episode 2 of Mushroom's Special Assignment Pack. Replaces Guided Training.
author: musicalmushr00m

name: Mission Difficulties
description: Enables extra difficulties on 9 missions. Enables saving in Holiday Hoarders and Hokkaido Snow Festival.
author: musicalmushr00m

name: Malpractice
description: Replaces the offline mode version of Patient Zero with an ET-style mission: steal the diamonds and kill the Director.
author: KevinRudd

name: CYOA Sapienza
description: Adds a mission to Sapienza where you can choose who to work for, and which objectives to do.
author: KevinRudd

name: Sniper Assassin: Hawke-aido
description: A Hawke's Bay Sniper Assassin-type mission set during sunset.
author: KevinRudd

name: All Missions Offline
description: Adds holiday and sniper missions to the menu when offline. Required for some mods to work.
author: KevinRudd

name: CYOA Marrakesh
description: Replaces A Gilded Cage with a mission where you work for either Crystal Dawn or the pro-democracy group Arab Spring.
author: KevinRudd

name: Suit Replacement Mod
description: Replaces 12 suits with disguises not unlockable in the normal game, as well as sneaking in cut disguises for specific maps.
author: KevinRudd

name: Fight Club
description: Deletes all NPC weapons, forcing guards to fistfight you. That, or T-pose on you.
author: Atampy26

name: Amasia Robbery
description: An offline contract with three levels, each increasing in difficulty. All levels replace Nightcall.
author: Fallen_cherry

name: The Analyst
description: The first Elusive Target of Season 2 takes place in Columbia. The target is Flint Montay, an analyst and drug manufacturer working for the Delgado cartel, who discovered a new method to create cocaine, which quickly made the cartel Columbia's biggest drug manufacturer.
author: Dr. Mekar

name: The Technican & The Constable
description: The second ET takes place in Sapienza. The targets are Maurice Konsandro, a former movie producer, and Alan, a corrupt cop, who used to break bones for the famous loan shark Damek McGarret, also known as Silverfish.
author: Dr. Mekar

name: The Salesman, The Competitors & The Dealer
description: The third ET, which serves to honor my first mod, the Elusive Four, takes place in Marrakesh. There are 4 targets, Benjamin Iskott, the sucessful but drug-addicted salesman, Patricia Karen and Tabitha Luise Pancras, two sales women for our client's competitor and lastly Thadeus Roltimus, the drug dealer of Iskott.
author: Dr. Mekar
